data.meta_description: Wish is the 42nd single by Nakashima Mika. It was released on November 2, 2022, and peaked at #23 on the Oricon single chart.[1] The lead track Wish was used as the ending theme for the anime Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition. Catalog Number: AICL-4286 (Regular Edition) AICL-4287/8...
data.text:
Wish is the 42nd single by Nakashima Mika. It was released on November 2, 2022, and peaked at #23 on the Oricon single chart.[1]

Single Information[]

The lead track Wish was used as the ending theme for the anime Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition.

Catalog Number:

AICL-4286 (Regular Edition)

AICL-4287/8 (Limited Edition)

All Lyrics: Nakashima Mika

Composition: Uchiyama Hitoshi (Track 1), Goda Tatsumi (Track 1), Ogi Gakushi (Track 1), Ito Ryo (Track 1), Shiro SAGISU (Track 2)

Arrangement: Yo Tomi (Track 1), Shiro SAGISU (Track 2)

Tracklist[]

CD[]

Wish

Mirage with Shiro SAGISU

Wish -TV size- (Limited Edition only)

Wish -instrumental-

Mirage with Shiro SAGISU -instrumental-

Limited Edition DVD[]

『ベルセルク黄金時代篇 MEMORIAL EDITION』 ノンクレジットED映像

Audio[]

Videos[]
